Name: Perfect Inventory - Organization Puzzle
About the game: Your goal is to perfectly fit all the items into the inventory without leaving any empty space. To do so, you have some features that can be useful: Drag and Rotate: Assembling and disassembling items makes the game more versatile and challenging: Bags, Backpacks and Chests can be used as containers to make room to fit more items: Featuring More than hand-drawn 100 items to organize and fit. 50 handcrafted levels. Relaxing medieval music to make you feel the atmosphere.
